name: Die Punch
description:
Die Punch is a single player arena brawler where the player will battle waves of enemies. The player can punch enemies, but a more effective way would be to punch giant 20 sided die into smaller enemy dice to eliminate them. Whenever the 20 sided die lands, a random effect will happen. This could be anything from the die getting smaller to meteors falling from the sky! 

The default controls are: 

Left Punch: M1

Right Punch: M2

Jump: Space

Dash: Left Shift

Movement: WASD

Developed by Elephant Resurrection:

Matt Green/MattyMidori - Artist

Ian Saunders - Programmer, Technical Artist

Clayton Renn - UI Designer, UI Programmer

Austin "Slayerrunes" Weary - Gameplay Designer, Programmer, Sound Engineer
